thread.title: Jamie Lynn Spears stood by unable to help as daughter crashed ATV
thread.title_full: Jamie Lynn Spears stood by unable to help as daughter crashed ATV

author: KATE FELDMAN
title: Jamie Lynn Spears stood by unable to help as daughter crashed ATV
text:
Jamie Lynn Spears stood by helplessly as 8-year-old daughter crashed ATV into water Jamie Lynn Spears stood by unable to help as daughter crashed ATV Jamie Lynn Spears was less than 100 yards away when her daughter flipped her ATV, but she was unable to help her. (Jeff Kravitz/BBMA2016/FilmMagic) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS Monday, February 6, 2017, 5:50 PM 
Jamie Lynn Spears was less than 100 yards away from her daughterâ€™s overturned ATV but couldnâ€™t help her. 
Spearsâ€™ 8-year-old daughter Maddie flipped her Polaris Sunday afternoon when she swerved to dodge a drainage ditch in her path and flipped the vehicle into a pond, the Tangipahoa Parish Sheriff's Department told People . 
Jamie Watson, Spearsâ€™ husband and Maddieâ€™s stepfather, was reportedly there as well, but unable to rescue the young girl who was trapped by her seatbelt. 
â€œWithin seconds, the childâ€™s mother, stepfather and other family members reached the pond, dove in and attempted to rescue the child to no avail,â€ the police report read . 
Jamie Lynn Spearsâ€™ daughter reportedly injured in ATV accident 
â€œThe child was trapped and secured by the seatbelt and the ATVâ€™s safety netting. Within two minutes, Acadian Ambulance Services arrived and assisted in freeing the child from the cold waters.â€ 
Maddie was unconscious after being removed from the water and was airlifted to a New Orleans hospital roughly 80 miles away, according to TMZ . Need all the wishes and prayers for my niece ğŸ’œ pic.twitter.com/lTlVQmNEh5 â€” Britney Spears (@britneyspears) February 6, 2017 
As of late Monday afternoon, Maddie was reportedly in critical but stable condition. 
â€œAll I can say is pray for our baby Maddie,â€ Spearsâ€™ father, Jamie Spears, told Entertainment Tonight Sunday. 
Britney Spears, Jamie Lynnâ€™s sister, sent a similar message Monday afternoon. 
â€œNeed all the wishes and prayers for my niece,â€ she wrote with a photo of Maddie. Join the Conversation:
